channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Operation Bridge Containerized Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Operation Bridge Containerized Suite

item.title: CVE-2018-18590|2024-09-17T01:15:29.620Z -- micro%20focus -- operation%20bridge%20containerized%20suite
item.description: A potential remote code execution and information disclosure vulnerability exists in Micro Focus Operations Bridge containerized suite versions 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05, 2018.08. This vulnerability could allow for information disclosure.
